SourceProxy.name: DEMReader
SourceProxy.label: DEM reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in DEM format
Documentation.long_help: Read a DEM (Digital Elevation Model) file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The DEM reader reads Digital Elevation Model files containing elevation values derived from the U. S. Geologic Survey. The default file extension is .dem. This reader produces uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data output.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the DEM (Digital Elevation Map) reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLMultiBlockDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Multi-Block Data reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a VTK XML multi-block data file and the serial VTK XML data files to which it points.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Multi-Block Data reader reads the VTK XML multi-block data file format. XML multi-block data files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, this reader will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtm and .vtmb.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK multi-block reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLMultiGroupDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Multi-Group Data reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a VTK XML multi-group data file and the serial VTK XML data files to which it points.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Multi-Group Data reader reads the VTK XML multi-group data file format. XML multi-group data files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, this reader will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtm and .vtmg.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK multi-group reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLHierarchicalDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Hierarchical Data reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a VTK XML Hierarchical Data file.
Documentation.long_help: Read a VTK XML Hierarchical data file and the serial VTK XML files to which it points.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Hierarchical Data reader reads the VTK XML hierarchical data file format. XML hierarchical data files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, it will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtm and .vthd.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK hierarchical data reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLHierarchicalBoxDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Hierarchical Box Data reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a VTK data file containing a hierarchical box dataset.
Documentation.long_help: Read a VTK XML-based data file containing a hierarchical dataset containing vtkUniformGrids.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Hierarchical Box Data reader reads VTK's XML-based file format containing a vtkHierarchicalBoxDataSet, which is a vtkHierarchicalDataSet containing only vtkUniformGrids. The expected file extensions are .vtm and .vthd.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK hierarchical box data reader.

SourceProxy.name: PVDReader
SourceProxy.label: PVD reader

Documentation.long_help: Load a dataset stored in ParaView's PVD file format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PVD reader reads data stored in ParaView's PVD file format. The .pvd file is essentially a header file that collects together other data files stored in VTK's XML-based file format.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PVD reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPolyDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Polydata reader

Documentation.long_help: Read serial VTK XML polydata files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Polydata reader reads the VTK XML polydata file format. The standard extension is .vtp.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML polygonal dataset reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the real-time VTK polygonal dataset reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: Location
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the data directory containing real time data files.

SourceProxy.name: XMLUnstructuredGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Unstructured Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML unstructured grid data files.
Documentation.long_help: Read serial VTK XML unstructured grid data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Unstructured Grid reader reads the VTK XML unstructured grid data file format. The standard extension is .vtu.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML unstructured grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLImageDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Image Data reader

Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML image data files.
Documentation.long_help: Read serial VTK XML image data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Image Data reader reads the VTK XML image data file format. The standard extension is .vti.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLStructuredGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Structured Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML structured grid data files.
Documentation.long_help: Read serial VTK XML structured grid data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Structured Grid reader reads the VTK XML structured grid data file format. The standard extension is .vts.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML structured grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLRectilinearGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Rectilinear Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML rectilinear grid data files.
Documentation.long_help: Read serial VTK XML rectilinear grid data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Rectilinear Grid reader reads the VTK XML rectilinear grid data file format. The standard extension is .vtr.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML non-uniform rectilinear grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPPolyDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Polydata reader

Documentation.short_help: Read partitioned VTK XML polydata files.
Documentation.long_help: Read the summary file and the associated VTK XML polydata files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Polydata reader reads the partitioned VTK polydata file format. It reads the partitioned format's summary file and then the associated VTK XML polydata files. The expected file extension is .pvtp.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the partitioned VTK XML polygonal dataset reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPUnstructuredGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Unstructured Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read partitioned VTK XML unstructured grid files.
Documentation.long_help: Read the summary file and the associated VTK XML unstructured grid files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Unstructured Grid reader reads the partitioned VTK unstructured grid data file format. It reads the partitioned format's summary file and then the associated VTK XML unstructured grid data files. The expected file extension is .pvtu.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the partitioned VTK XML unstructured grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPImageDataReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Image Data reader

Documentation.short_help: Read partitioned VTK XML image data files.
Documentation.long_help: Read the summary file and the associated VTK XML image data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Image Data reader reads the partitioned VTK image data file format. It reads the partitioned format's summary file and then the associated VTK XML image data files. The expected file extension is .pvti.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the partitioned VTK XML uniform rectilinear grid (image/volume) reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This propert lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPStructuredGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Structured Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read partitioned VTK XML structured grid files.
Documentation.long_help: Read the summary file and the associated VTK XML structured grid files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Structured Grid reader reads the partitioned VTK structured grid data file format. It reads the partitioned format's summary file and then the associated VTK XML structured grid data files. The expected file extension is .pvts.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the partitioned VTK XML structured grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPRectilinearGridReader
SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Rectilinear Grid reader

Documentation.short_help: Read partitioned VTK XML rectilinear grid files.
Documentation.long_help: Read the summary file and the associated VTK XML rectilinear grid files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Rectilinear Grid reader reads the partitioned VTK rectilinear grid file format. It reads the partitioned format's summary file and then the associated VTK XML rectilinear grid files. The expected file extension is .pvtr.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the partitioned VTK XML non-uniform rectilinear grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: legacyreader
SourceProxy.label: Legacy VTK reader

Documentation.long_help: Read files stored in VTK's legacy file format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Legacy VTK reader loads files stored in VTK's legacy file format (before VTK 4.2, although still supported). The expected file extension is .vtk. The type of the dataset may be structured grid, uniform rectilinear grid (image/volume), non-uniform rectiinear grid, unstructured grid, or polygonal.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Legacy VTK reader.

SourceProxy.name: pvtkfile
SourceProxy.label: Partitioned Legacy VTK reader

Documentation.long_help: Read files stored in VTK partitioned legacy format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Partitioned Legacy VTK reader loads files stored in VTK's partitioned legac file format (before VTK 4.2, although still supported). The expected file extension is .pvtk. The type of the dataset may be structured grid, uniform rectilinear grid (image/volume), non-uniform rectilinear grid, unstructured grid, or polygonal.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Partitioned Legacy VTK reader.

SourceProxy.name: ensight
SourceProxy.label: EnSight reader

Documentation.long_help: Read EnSight 6 and Gold files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The EnSight reader reads files in the format produced by CEI's EnSight. EnSight 6 and Gold files (both ASCII and binary) are supported. The default extension is .case. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: CaseFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the case file name for the EnSight reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the byte order of the binary file(s).

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: HDF5RawImageReader
SourceProxy.label: HDF5 Raw Image reader

Documentation.long_help: Read HDF5 raw image data files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The HDF5 Raw Image reader reads data in the hierarchical data format (HDF). This format was created at the National Center for Supercomputing Applications (NCSA) at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Files of this type have a .h5 extension. The output of this reader is uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the HDF5 raw image reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: Stride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The values in this property indicate whether/how the data should be subsampled. Points will be skipped so that a smaller version of the data is produced. The first value indicates the change in index from one point to the next in X. The remaining two values do the same for Y and Z, respectively.

SourceProxy.name: spcthreader
SourceProxy.label: Spy Plot reader

Documentation.short_help: Read files in the Spy Plot format.
Documentation.long_help: Read files in the SPCTH Spy Plot file format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Spy Plot reader loads an ASCII meta-file called the "case" file (extension .spcth). The case file lists all the binary files containing the dataset. This reader produces hierarchical datasets.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Spy Plot reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: DownConvertVolumeFraction
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 0, the type of the volume fraction is float; is set to 1, the type is unsigned char.

IntVectorProperty.name: DistributeFiles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In parallel mode, if this property is set to 1, the reader will distribute files or blocks.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateLevelArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, a cell array will be generated that stores the level of each block.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateActiveBlockArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, a cell array will be generated that stores the active status of a block.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateBlockIdArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, a cell array will be generated that stores a unique blockId for each block.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: vrmlreader
SourceProxy.label: VRML reader

Documentation.long_help: Load the geometry from a VRML 2.0 file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The VRML reader loads only the geometry from a VRML (Virtual Reality Modeling Language) 2.0 file. The expected file extension is .wrl. The output of this reader is a polygonal dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VRML reader.

SourceProxy.name: plyreader
SourceProxy.label: PLY reader

Documentation.long_help: Read files stored in Stanford University's PLY polygonal file format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PLY reader reads files stored in the PLY polygonal file format developed at Stanford University. The PLY files that ParaView can read must have the elements "vertex" and "face" defined. The "vertex" elements must have the propertys "x", "y", and "z". The "face" elements must have the property "vertex_indices" defined. The default file extension for this reader is .ply.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PLY reader.

SourceProxy.name: pdbreader
SourceProxy.label: PDB reader

Documentation.long_help: Read PDB molecule files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PDB reader reads files in the format used by the Protein Data Bank (an archive of experimentally determined three-dimensional structures of biological macromolecules). The expected file extension is .pdb. The output datasets are polygonal.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PDB reader.

SourceProxy.name: xyzreader
SourceProxy.label: XYZ reader

Documentation.long_help: Read XYZ molecular data files into a polygonal dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XYZ reader reads XYZ molecular data files. The expected file extension is .xyz. The output of this reader is a polygonal dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the XYZ reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the timestep the XYZ reader should load.

SourceProxy.name: P3DReader
SourceProxy.label: PLOT3D reader

Documentation.long_help: Read ASCII or binary PLOT3D files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: PLOT3D is a plotting package developed at NASA. The PLOT3D reader can read both ASCII and binary PLOT3D files. The default file extension for the geometry files is .xyz, and the default file extension for the solution files is .q. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset containing curvilinear (structured grid) datasets.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the .xyz (geometry) file name for the PLOT3D reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: QFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the .q (solution) file name for the PLOT3D reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: BinaryFile
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether the data files are binary.

IntVectorProperty.name: MultiGrid
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether these files have multiple-block information.

IntVectorProperty.name: HasByteCount
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether this file uses Fortran leading-trailing byte counts.

IntVectorProperty.name: IBlanking
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether this dataset has visibility information.

IntVectorProperty.name: TwoDimensionalGeometry
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether the data is two- or three-dimensional.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceRead
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether to attempt to read the file even if it appears corrupt

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the byte order of any binary file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: Functions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which functions (point-centered arrays) to compute.

SourceProxy.name: PhastaReader
SourceProxy.label: Phasta reader

Documentation.short_help: Read datasets stored in the Phasta format.
Documentation.long_help: Read the parallel Phasta meta-file and the underlying Phasta files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This Phasta reader reads files stored in the Phasta (a CFD package) format. The expected file extension is .pht. The output of this reader is an unstructured grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Phasta reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which timestep in the dataset to load.

SourceProxy.name: stlreader
SourceProxy.label: STL reader

Documentation.long_help: Read ASCII or binary stereo lithography (STL) files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The STL reader reads ASCII or binary stereo lithography (STL) files. The expected file extension is .stl. The output of this reader is a polygonal dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the STL reader.

SourceProxy.name: byureader
SourceProxy.label: BYU reader

Documentation.long_help: Read Movie.BYU files to produce polygonal data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The BYU reader reads data stored in Movie.BYU format. The expected file extension is .g. The datasets resulting from reading these files are polygonal.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the BYU reader.

SourceProxy.name: gaussiancubereader
SourceProxy.label: Gaussian Cube reader

Documentation.long_help: Produce polygonal data by reading a Gaussian Cube file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Gaussian Cube reader produces polygonal data by reading data files produced by the Gaussian software package. The expected file extension is .cube.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Gaussian Cube reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: HBScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the HB scale.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the B scale.

SourceProxy.name: popreader
SourceProxy.label: POP reader

Documentation.long_help: Read data files from the Parallel Ocean Program (POP).

SourceProxy.Documentation: The POP reader reads data files from the Parallel Ocean Program (POP). The expected file extension is .pop. The output of this reader is a structured grid dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the POP Ocean file reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the radius of the dataset.

IntVectorProperty.name: ClipExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the minimum and maximum extent in each dimension of the dataset (X, Y, and Z) to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfGhostLevels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the number of ghost levels to generate.

SourceProxy.name: ensightMS
SourceProxy.label: EnSight Master Server reader

Documentation.long_help: Read files in EnSight's Master Server format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The EnSight Master Server reader reads EnSight's parallel files. The master file ususally has a .sos extension and may point to multiple .case files. The output is a multi-block dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: CaseFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the .sos file for the EnSight Master Server reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: ByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the byte order of the binary file(s).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SetTimeValue
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which time value to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: ImageReader
SourceProxy.label: Image reader

Documentation.short_help: Read raw regular rectilinear grid data from a file.
Documentation.long_help: Read raw regular rectilinear grid data from a file. The dimensions and type of the data must be specified.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Image reader reads raw regular rectilinear grid (image/volume) data from a file. Because no metadata is provided, the user must specify information about the size, spacing, dimensionality, etc. about the dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePrefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The text string contained in this property specifies the file prefix (directory plus common initial part of file name) for the raw binary uniform rectilinear grid dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The text string contained in the property specifies the format string to determine the file names necessary for reading this dataset. In creating the filenames, %s will be replaced by the prefix and %d by a digit which represents the slice number in Z. The format string is the same as that used by printf.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataScalarType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property indicates the scalar type of the pixels/voxels in the file(s): short, int, float ...

IntVectorProperty.name: DataByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the byte order of the binary file(s).

IntVectorProperty.name: FileDimensionality
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether the file(s) in this dataset contain slices (2D) or volumes (3D).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataOrigin
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The coordinate contained in this property specifies the position of the point with index (0,0,0).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the size of a voxel in each dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the minimum and maximum index values of the data in each dimension (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax).

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfScalarComponents
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the number of componenets the scalar value at each pixel or voxel has (e.g., RGB - 3 scalar components).

StringVectorProperty.name: ScalarArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a text string listing a name to assign to the point-centered data array read.

SourceProxy.name: XdmfReader
SourceProxy.label: XDMF reader

Documentation.long_help: Read XDMF (eXtensible Data Model and Format) files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XDMF reader reads files in XDMF format. The expected file extension is .xmf. Metadata is stored in the XDMF file using an XML format, and large attribute arrays are stored in a corresponding HDF5 file. The output may be unstructured grid, structured grid, or rectiliner grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the XDMF reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: SetDomainName
StringVectorProperty.label: Domain Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the domain name.

StringVectorProperty.name: SetGridName
StringVectorProperty.label: Grid Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the grid name.

StringVectorProperty.name: EnableGrid
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which grid(s) to enable.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which the cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which the point-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: Stride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If loading structured data, this property indicate the number of indices per dimension (X, Y, or Z) to skip between each point included in this output.

StringVectorProperty.name: ParameterIndex
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the parameter index.

SourceProxy.name: ExodusReader
SourceProxy.label: Exodus reader

Documentation.long_help: Read an Exodus II file to produce an unstructured grid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Exodus reader loads Exodus II files and produces an unstructured grid output. The default file extensions are .g, .e, .ex2, .ex2v2, .exo, .gen, .exoII, .0, .00, .000, and .0000.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Exodus reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: XMLFileName
StringVectorProperty.label: XML File Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of an XML file containing part and material descriptions and a mapping to element blocks.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePrefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file root used with the file pattern to format a file name. (See the File Pattern property.)

StringVectorProperty.name: FilePattern
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a text string specifying the pattern used to load files. There are two parts to it: the prefix (%s) and the file number (%i). The format used is the same as that used for printf.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the indices of the first and last files to be read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: SideSetArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Side Set Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which side set arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: NodeSetArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Node Set Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which node set arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisplayType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the display type (blocks = 1, materials = 2, hierarchy = 3).

StringVectorProperty.name: BlockArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Block Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which block arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: MaterialArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Material Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which material arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: HierarchyArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Hierarchy Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which hierarchy arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateBlockIdCellArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Block Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the reader will generate block ids. Otherwise these ids will not be generated.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateGlobalNodeIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Global Node Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the reader will generate global node ids. Otherwise these ids will not be generated.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateGlobalElementIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Global Element Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the reader will generates global element ids. Otherwise these ids will not be generated.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateFileIdArray
IntVectorProperty.label: File Ids
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the reader will generate cell-based disk file ids. Otherwise these ids will not be generated.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExodusModelMetadata
IntVectorProperty.label: Include metadata
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, Exodus model metadata will be created; this is the case needed if you plan to write Exodus or EnSight files. Otherwise set this property to 0 and the metadata will not be created.

IntVectorProperty.name: ApplyDisplacements
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the reader will automatically apply displacements.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DisplacementMagnitude
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If the value of the Apply Displacements property is 1, the value of this property specifies the magnitude of the applied displacement.

IntVectorProperty.name: HasModeShapes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Some simulations overload the Exodus time steps to represent mode shapes. In this case, it does not make sense to iterate over the "time steps", because they are not meant to be played in order. Rather, each represents the vibration at a different "mode." Setting the value of this property to 1 changes the semantics of the reader to not report the time steps to downstream filters.

SourceProxy.name: AVSucdReader
SourceProxy.label: AVS UCD reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in AVS UCD format.
Documentation.long_help: Read binary or ASCII files stored in AVS UCD format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The AVS UCD reader reads binary or ASCII files stored in AVS UCD format. The default file extension is .inp. The output of this reader is unstructured grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the AVS UCD reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the point-centered arrays to read.

SourceProxy.name: Facet Reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in Facet format.
Documentation.long_help: Read ASCII files stored in Facet format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Facet Reader reads files in Facet format: a simple ASCII file format listing point coordinates and connectivity between these points. The default file extension is .facet. The output of the Facet Reader is polygonal.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Facet reader.

SourceProxy.name: Meta Image Reader

Documentation.long_help: Read binary UNC meta image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Meta Image Reader reads binary UNC meta image data, and produces uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data. The default file extensions are .mhd and .mha.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Meta Image reader.

SourceProxy.name: PNGReader
SourceProxy.label: PNG reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a PNG file into an image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PNG reader reads PNG (Portable Network Graphics) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .png.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PNG reader.

SourceProxy.name: SESAMEReader
SourceProxy.label: SESAME reader

Documentation.long_help: Read SESAME data files, producing rectilinear grids.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The SESAME reader reads SESAME data files, and outputs rectilinear grids. The expected file extension is .sesame.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the SESAME reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TableId
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This proeprty indicates which table to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the OpenFOAM reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the MFIX reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the FLUENT reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the file name for the LSDyna reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeStep
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current timestep.

StringVectorProperty.name: SolidArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Solid Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which solid arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ThickShellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Thick Shell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which thick shell arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ShellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Shell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which shell arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: RigidBodyArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Rigid Body Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which rigid body arrays to load.

StringVectorProperty.name: RoadSurfaceArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Road Surface Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which road surface arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: BeamArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Beam Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which beam arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: ParticleArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Particle Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which particle arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: PartArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Part Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which part arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DeformedMesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the mesh be deformed over time (if the Deflection node array is set to load)?

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveDeletedCells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should cells that have been deleted (failed structurally, for example) be removed from the mesh?

IntVectorProperty.name: SplitByMaterialId
IntVectorProperty.label: Split by Material Id
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should each material have its own mesh, or should there be one mesh for all materials?

SourceProxy.name: CSVReader
SourceProxy.label: CSV reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a comma-separated values file into a 1D rectilinear grid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CSV reader reads a comma-separated values file into a 1D rectilinear grid. If the file was saved using the CSVWriter, then the rectilinear grid's points and point data can be restored as well as the cell data. Otherwise all the data in the CSV file is treated as cell data. The default file extension is .csv.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the CSV (Command Separated Values) reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseStringDelimiter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether to use the string delimiter.

IntVectorProperty.name: HaveHeaders
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If the value of this property is 1, treat the first line of the file as headers.

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldDelimiterCharacters
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the characters that may be used to separate fields. For example, a value of "," indicates a comma-separated value file. A value of ".:;" indicates that columns may be separated by a period, colon or semicolon. The order of the characters in the text string does not matter.
